subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3481 is on the way
description_text:
Hi there. I’m reaching out because it looks like the tracking number you gave me is not complete. Can you please resend the whole correct tracking number. 
Thanks.


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi tyler helie,     Your tracking number is correct, but the parcel is currently awaiting collection at the US warehouse. We shall expedite the process on your behalf.

Sounds good. Thanks.
Is it possible to cancel the order for just the E-Brake? I’d still like the pedals. But unfortunately realized I don’t have any room for the E-brake on my setup after moving some stuff around.
Let me know if that’s possible. 
Tyler


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
